scripts.start: npm run build:happ && cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) APP_ID=elemental-chess ENV=hcdev npm run start:inner
scripts.start:holo:alice: concurrently -k "npm:chaperone-alice" "HC_PORT=8888 CHAPERONE_PORT=24273 ENV=holodev APP_ID=uhCkkHSLbocQFSn5hKAVFc_L34ssLD52E37kq6Gw9O3vklQ3Jv7eL ADMIN_PORT=9000 npm run start:inner"
scripts.start:holo:bob: concurrently -k "npm:chaperone-bob" "HC_PORT=8889 CHAPERONE_PORT=24274 ENV=holodev APP_ID=uhCkkHSLbocQFSn5hKAVFc_L34ssLD52E37kq6Gw9O3vklQ3Jv7eL ADMIN_PORT=9001 npm run start:inner"
scripts.start:inner: npm run build -w @eyss/chess && concurrently -k "npm run start:happ" "npm run build:watch -w @eyss/chess" "npm run start -w @eyss/elemental-chess"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm t -w tests
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @eyss/chess && npm run package:holochain && npm run package:holo
scripts.package:holochain: npm run build:holochain -w @eyss/elemental-chess && cd ui/elemental-chess/dist && bestzip ../dist.zip * && cd ../../../ && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.package:holo: npm run build:holo -w @eyss/elemental-chess && cd ui/elemental-chess/dist && bestzip ../../../workdir/elemental-chess-ui.zip *
scripts.start:happ: hc s clean && RUST_LOG=warn hc s -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/elemental-chess.happ --run=$HC_PORT --app-id=$APP_ID network mdns
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack ./workdir/
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack ./dna/workdir/
